def max_sum_after_operations(n, array):
    x = len([elem for elem in array if elem < 0])
    values = sorted([abs(elem) for elem in array])
    result = sum(values)
    if n % 2 == 0 or x % 2 == 1:
        result -= 2 * values[0]
    return result
